string-array.name: information
string-array.item: SinghShopss chocolate shake is a delicious chocolate dessert made with vanilla and chocolate syrup.
SinghShopss Stawberry shake is made with creamy vanilla soft serve, blended with Stawberry syrup.
SinghShopss Vanilla shake is made with creamy vanilla soft serve, topped with whipped topping for cool tasty treat.
Smooth and creamy vanilla soft serve, topped with your choice of yummy caramel sauce. Mmmm!
Smooth and creamy vanilla soft serve, topped with decadent hot fudge sauce. Mmmm!
A classic flavour is back for a limited time only! The delicious and refreshing taste of mint is back in our iconic Shamrock Shake. While supplies last.
Blended with ice, real mango and pineapple purée. Enjoy it with or without yogurt.
Made with real fruit purée and ice, it’s a refreshing way to enjoy the taste of blueberries and pomegranate. Try yours with or without yogurt.
Thick, smooth and deliciously creamy soft serve, mixed with your choice of decadent chocolate, strawberry or vanilla syrup for an extra taste of yumminess.
Thick, smooth and deliciously creamy soft serve, mixed with your choice of decadent chocolate, strawberry or vanilla syrup for an extra taste of yumminess.
Thick, smooth and deliciously creamy soft serve, mixed with your choice of decadent chocolate, strawberry or vanilla syrup for an extra taste of yumminess.
Get a taste of real strawberry and banana purée blended to perfection with ice. Enjoy it with or without yogurt.\ \ *in small, medium and large
